4318250.name: Genesis: Voces de la Niebla (Voices of the Mist)
4318250.description:
A tribute to classic horror, created with passion and limited resources.

Genesis is an indie psychological horror game developed in Unity. It was created by a single developer in Argentina, using the resources available and with a clear goal: to fulfill the dream of making a horror game inspired by the classics.

The game focuses on a direct and atmospheric experience, where tension, sound, and environment matter more than modern graphics. What begins as a simple investigation soon turns into a terrifying experience. Explore different locations, solve puzzles, interact with other characters, and face your darkest nightmares in a story divided into three chapters, where survival is just as important as uncovering the truth.

ğŸ”¹ An Honest Experience

This is an indie project made with effort and dedication. It doesnâ€™t aim to compete with large productions, but rather to offer a sincere horror experience, created by someone who loves the genre and wanted to bring their vision to life.

If you enjoy classic horror games, short and intense experiences, and supporting indie development, Genesis is for you.
